mapper.insert:
insert into safety.alarm_record_result(id, alarm_time, dst_ip, src_ip, alarm_name, payload, is_safe_attack, attack_type, attack_field, attack_port) values
(#{entity.id},#{entity.alarmTime},#{entity.dstIp},#{entity.srcIp},#{entity.alarmName},#{entity.payload},#{entity.isSafeAttack},#{entity.attackType},#{entity.attackField},#{entity.attackPort})
